title: Mazhaithuli Azhaga Lyrics Om Shanthi Om Song Lyrics
singerName: Aalap Raju, Devan Ekambaram, Dr Burn
stanzas:
Mazhaithuli Azhaga Ival Azhaga Lyrics Om Shanthi Om
Singer(s): Aalaap Raju, Devan, Dr.Burn
Lyrics: Na Muthukumar

Oru vatta nila
pol aval azhagu
vaal natchathiram
pol aval sirippu

Ennulle ennulle sendraale
vendaam ini vendaam vilagaadhey

Mazhaithuli azhagaa ival azhagaa
manasukull kelvi ondru kettaen
Ival manam pol
mazhathuli eeeram illai.

Manjal veyil azhagaa ival azhagaa
vizhigalil kelvi ondru kettaen
ival mugam pol
veyil adhu jolikka villai.

Idho nenjai alli
pogindraal
adho konjam thalli
pogindraal
adho kenja vaithu
pogindraal, nanbaa

Ival yaaro enna paero
arindhidum aaval thindaada.
oru paarvai ival paarththaal
uyir anu yaavum kondaada.

Ival siriththaal pookkal malarum
ival nadandhaal boomi suzhalum
ival azhagil idhayam kiliyum
nanbaa....

Idho nenjai alli
pogindraal
adho konjam thalli
pogindraal
adho kenja vaithu
pogindraal, nanbaa

Un uchchithanai nugarndha
pachchai kuzhandhayin vaasam
adhu vendum idhu vendum
pidivaadham konjam konjam
adhigaaram
dhevadhaikku alangaaram
oru nodi paarvai pattaal
adhu podhum
..
ennaavil padhaartham
udayaida nalinam
pudhuraga paravasam.

Thottu chellum ennai
vittu chellaaadhey vendaam
kattikol ennai nithttham
unvaasam enmael veesum.

Alai alaiiyaai kaattril aadi
koondhalin nilaigal kothtthaada.
aannmanadhin thimirai ellaam
asaivugalaale pandhaada

Ival vizhigal minnal thugalo
ival nizhalum azhagin nagalo
ini dhinamum ivalin kanavo
nanbaaa

Idho nenjai alli
pogindraal
adho konjam thalli
pogindraal
adho kenja vaithu
pogindraal, nanbaa

Mazhaithuli azhagaa ival azhagaa
manasukull kelvi ondru kettaen
Ival manam pol
mazhathuli eeeram illai.

Manjal veyil azhagaa ival azhagaa
vizhigalil kelvi ondru kettaen
ival mugam pol
veyil adhu jolikka villai. Â
